Package ili.lights

Interface Summary
LightListener  
 

Class Summary
CCTLight The CCTLight is a subclass of the Light object and contains a range of warm-white to cool-white light.
ColorLight The ColorLight is a subclass of the Light object and contains a light color, that can be set using RGB and HSB parameters
Light This is a general light object which contains a light state (on/off) and an intensity, and intensity range and can be used to create representations of light sources
LightEvent The LightEvent is a subclass of EventObject and is thrown by light sources when any of their parameters change.
